body:
[Bed]: You are not sure why you woke up in a place that is not the bed. Maybe it's too dusty for you too sleep in. 

[Forbearance]: "We shouldn't touch this bed for now." 

[1]: [Touch Bed] 
[2]: [Leave]
title: Start1

body:
[Bed]: You touch the bed, and it feels like a bed. That's it. You can leave now. 

[1]: [End]
title: Touch
